poster.username: 不忘生养之仇，立志杀父弑母

body: @Wolf of the Saturn Six Stop calling Chinese culture "ChingChong". Or do you mind me insulting your culture and people? Should I call you "Yankee","Gueilo" or "Nigger"? If you feel bad to be disrespected, stop disrespecting.
QIPAO!!!! 😍😍😍😍😍😍 THIS IS WHY I LOVE CHINGCHONG CULTURE
